segments.text: I can ’ t believe these skirts are so cheap .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know and they are really nice , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ ll have to get a couple in different colors .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Buy them now though , or they might not still be here tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea , especially at this price .
segments.speaker: S2
